'''Dr. Allen''' works for the Pegasus-owned Portland General Hospital.


Dr. Allen was among the group of doctors Callie and Richard spoke to while pretending to work for Pegasus.


Dr. Allen works for the Pegasus-owned Portland General Hospital.


*He had to do a cardiac cath on a patient with no signs of heart disease because it was Pegasus's policy.
